name: kde-float
description: Cycle windows between two customizable sizes with a keyboard shortcut

scripts.kwin:disable: kwriteconfig6 --file kwinrc --group Plugins --key kdeFloatEnabled false && qdbus6 org.kde.KWin /KWin reconfigure
scripts.kwin:enable: kwriteconfig6 --file kwinrc --group Plugins --key kdeFloatEnabled true && qdbus6 org.kde.KWin /KWin reconfigure
scripts.build: cd src && zip -r ../kdeFloat.kwinscript contents/ metadata.json && cd .. && zip kdeFloat.kwinscript LICENSE
scripts.restart: pnpm kwin:disable && pnpm kwin:uninstall && pnpm kwin:install && pnpm kwin:enable && pnpm kwin:log
scripts.version: npm run --silent package && git add -- metadata.json kdeFloat.kwinscript
